text: Konstantin Mikhailovich Veselovskiy (; born 21 April 1974 in Moscow) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Footballers from Moscow Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Lokomotiv Nizhny Novgorod players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players Category:FC Moscow players Category:FC Spartak Moscow players Category:Association football forwards
title: Konstantin Veselovskiy
